title: Air Conditioning/Heating, 24/7 Emergency Maintenance, Dishwasher
posting_body: Our community offers modern 1 bedroom and 1 bedroom townhomes with premium flooring, recessed lighting, fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances.
The premises offers a secured entrance, tiled common areas, and assigned subterranean gated parking.
Laundry facility on-site and the community is pet friendly.
Located in the heart of the San Fernando Valley, home to restaurants, shopping and convenient freeway access.
Close proximity to California State University Northridge and 2.8 miles from Lake Balboa which offers outdoor family entertainment and The Japanese Garden located in the Lake Balboa district.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
